sentences.en: A batholith has been defined as a huge intrusive mass of granitic rock.
sentences.cn: 岩基的定义是巨大的花岗石侵入岩体.

sentences.en: A variety of geological environments are extrusive or intrusive rocks.
sentences.cn: 不同的地质环境形成喷出岩或侵入岩.

sentences.en: Non - copyable and non - movable objects can't be stored in non - intrusive containers.
sentences.cn: 不可复制和不可移动的对象不能保存在 非 介入式容器中.

sentences.en: She didn't hesitate to tell intrusive photographers to "naff off".
sentences.cn: 她毫不客气地叫那些烦人的摄影者“滚开”。

sentences.en: Staff are courteous but never intrusive.
sentences.cn: 员工谦恭有礼却从不让人感到唐突。

sentences.en: Temperature taking is intrusive and will upset the child.
sentences.cn: 测量体温是对小儿烦扰,会使小儿不安.

sentences.en: The administration of medications is often viewed as an intrusive procedure by the child.
sentences.cn: 孩子们常常把吃药看作是对他们的侵扰.

sentences.en: The cameras were not an intrusive presence.
sentences.cn: 那些摄像机的存在并不令人反感。

sentences.en: The constant presence of the media was very intrusive.
sentences.cn: 媒体一直在场十分令人讨厌。

sentences.en: The most common intrusive in the order of igneous rocks is granite.
sentences.cn: 在火成岩系列中最常见的侵入体是花岗岩.

sentences.en: The most impressive form of intrusive is the dike.
sentences.cn: 最引人注目的侵入体是岩脉.

sentences.en: The new measures are aimed at cutting back on intrusive telephone solicitations.
sentences.cn: 新措施旨在减少不请自来的电话调查。

sentences.en: They found the television cameras too intrusive.
sentences.cn: 他们认为电视摄像机太烦人了。

sentences.en: This whole process offers a sustainable and non - intrusive way to decontaminate land.
sentences.cn: 整个过程提供了一种可持续性、 非 侵扰性的土地净化方式.

sentences.en: We both felt intrusive and out of place.
sentences.cn: 我们俩都觉得闯到这里来很不合适.

sentences.en: Yanshanian strongly peraluminous intrusive rocks occur sporadically in the Hebei - Shanxi - Liaoning area.
sentences.cn: 燕山期强过铝质侵入岩零星出露于 冀晋 辽地区.

trans.tran_en: affecting someone’s private life or interrupting them in an unwanted and annoying way
